explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a mask is standing in front of a large indoor LED display screen showing a blue desktop background and several application icons. The man is holding a tool in his left hand and touching the screen with his right hand as if operating or demonstrating it.

[0-4] Then the man gently taps the screen with his hand, starts to disassemble the LED display with the tool in his left hand, and unplugs the relevant interfaces, revealing the internal structure of the module back, such as circuit boards, power supplies, and cables.
